cause.description:
This is a group for all the people who believe that it is high time to have peace in the Middle East. I refuse to believe that this world consist of people who rather turn there head when there is someone in trouble, the Middle-East has been in trouble for a long time...it is time for people to stand up & say enough is enough... We demand that the leaders work harder to resolve ALL issues so that our children can grow up in a future where there is peace in the Middle-East... If u agree then please sign up & pass this forward to everyone. I don't care if you are Palestinian, Israeli, Iranian, German, American, Black, White, Pink, Yellow...we are all humans & we all bleed...tell you another secret it is RED no matter where you are from & which God you belive in... It is time to stand together & make our voice heard... This is a peaceful group, so if you prefer other ways to make your stand please do so somewhere else... I wish everybody welcome. Peace, Badboni
1. Peace is the only solution people can live with.
2. This can save a lot of lives on both sides.
3. Killing eachother is not going to solve anything!!
cause.name: Peace in the Middle-East
